message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $8500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7200. I'm interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $8000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm counteroffering at $7800. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my costs.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'm counteroffering at $7600. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7400 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'm counteroffering at $7500. This is the final price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
